642.title: You grant perpetual license to anything you publish

tosdr.case: You grant perpetual license to anything you publish-bad-80
tosdr.tldr: You grant perpetual license to use anything you publish. While the global license expires when you unsubscribe, public content will remain licensed and will not be deleted.

719.quoteText:
Remember that shared or publicly available information may be used and re-shared by other users on Spotify or across the web, so please use Spotify carefully and be mindful of your account settings.
Spotify has no responsibility for your choices to post material on the Service.
719.title: Spotify states risks of public information

tosdr.case: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online
tosdr.tldr: Spotify expressly states the implications of keeping information public, and also that certain specific information (e.g., username, profile picture) may not be able to be made private.

741.quoteText:
We implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to help protect the security of your personal data.
however, please note that no system is ever completely secure.
741.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
tosdr.tldr: Although Spotify states they are committed to data security, the also state that they cannot guarantee any success in that area.

852.quoteText: Spotify may terminate the Agreements or suspend your access to the Spotify Service at any time, including in the event of your actual or suspected unauthorized use of the Spotify Service and/or Content, or non-compliance with the Agreements
852.title: Spotify can delete your account without telling you

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
tosdr.tldr: Spotify can close your account without notice, without refund, for any or no reason.

meta.author: Ian McGowan

855.quoteText: We share your personal data when we in good faith believe it is necessary for us to do so in order to comply with a legal obligation under applicable law, or respond to valid legal process, such as a search warrant, a court order, or a subpoena
855.title: No promise to inform about government requests

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
tosdr.tldr: Spotify does not explicitly state that they will inform users of any law or government requests regarding any personal user information.

1082.title: The ToS are only translated into a few languages

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are translated into different languages
tosdr.tldr: Although Spotify allows users to choose their country (Andorra, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Monaco, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States), the terms themselves are only available in English, French, German, and Spanish.

12744.quoteText: Where applicable and permitted under applicable law, you also agree to waive and not enforce any “moral rights” or equivalent rights, such as your right to be identified as the author of any User Content, including Feedback, and your right to object to derogatory treatment of such User Content.
12744.title: You waive your moral rights

12747.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content

tosdr.case: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content
tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "Don’t engage in any activity, post any User Content, or register and/or use a username, which is or includes material that: is offensive, abusive, defamatory, pornographic, threatening, or obscene."

12754.quoteText: Sections 7, 8, 9, 11, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22, 23, and 24 herein, as well as any other sections of the Agreements that, either explicitly or by their nature, must remain in effect even after termination of the Agreements, shall survive termination.
12754.title: defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination

tosdr.case: defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination

12755.quoteText: YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT THE SPOTIFY SERVICE IS PROVIDED “AS IS” AND “AS AVAILABLE,” WITHOUT EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTY OR CONDITION OF ANY KIND.
12755.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

12758.quoteText: IN ADDITION, SPOTIFY MAKES NO REPRESENTATION NOR DOES IT WARRANT, ENDORSE, GUARANTEE, OR ASSUME RESPONSIBILITY FOR ANY THIRD PARTY APPLICATIONS (OR THE CONTENT THEREOF), USER CONTENT, DEVICES OR ANY OTHER PRODUCT OR SERVICE ADVERTISED, PROMOTED OR OFFERED BY A THIRD PARTY ON OR THROUGH THE SPOTIFY SERVICE OR ANY HYPERLINKED WEBSITE, OR FEATURED IN ANY BANNER OR OTHER ADVERTISING AND SPOTIFY IS NOT RESPONSIBLE OR LIABLE FOR ANY TRANSACTION BETWEEN YOU AND THIRD PARTY PROVIDERS OF THE FOREGOING.
12758.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

tosdr.case: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

12761.quoteText: OR (3) AGGREGATE LIABILITY FOR ALL CLAIMS RELATING TO THE SPOTIFY SERVICE, THIRD PARTY APPLICATIONS, OR THIRD PARTY APPLICATION CONTENT MORE THAN THE AMOUNTS PAID BY YOU TO SPOTIFY DURING THE PRIOR TWELVE MONTHS IN QUESTION.
12761.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

tosdr.case: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

12762.quoteText: Unless as otherwise stated in the Agreements, should any provision of the Agreements be held invalid or unenforceable for any reason or to any extent, such invalidity or enforceability shall not in any manner affect or render invalid or unenforceable the remaining provisions of the Agreements, and the application of that provision shall be enforced to the extent permitted by law.
12762.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

12768.quoteText:
Class Action Waiver

YOU AND SPOTIFY AGREE THAT EACH MAY BRING CLAIMS AGAINST THE OTHER ONLY IN YOUR OR ITS INDIVIDUAL CAPACITY AND NOT AS A PLAINTIFF OR CLASS MEMBER IN ANY PURPORTED CLASS OR REPRESENTATIVE ACTION.
12768.title: You waive your right to a class action.

tosdr.case: You waive your right to a class action.
